name: Crash Racer
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam.

In this game you drive a car around a loop to destroy objects. You start out with ten seconds on the clock and earn one extra second for every object you destroy.  See how long you can last.

Models are all from Simple City pack by 255 pixel studios on the Unity Asset Store.

Sprite art is by artist Zohar Dayan @proto880 on Instagram.
